application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO 0141-T1 - Norway Maple - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction. 

TPO 0141- T3 - London Plane - Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points.

TPO 0141-T9 - Sycamore - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction. 

TPO 0141-T12 - Norway maple - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction, retaining furnishing growth. 

TPO 0141-T13 - Norway maple - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction, retaining furnishing growth. 

TPO 0141-T17 - Weeping pear - Reduce all aspects of crown by approx. 1.5-2.2m to create a tight and tidy shape. lift to 2.5m.

TPO 0141-T20 - Sycamore - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction.
